<div class="owl-carousel" id="cp-carousel">

<div class="container">
<div class="carousel-content purple welcome welcome" data-title="Welcome" id="welcome">
<h1>Welcome to NHS Tameside and Glossop Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG).</h1>
<h5>Our aim is to improve the health and lives of nearly 250,000 people across Tameside and Glossop through the services we commission.</h5>
We are a membership organisation led by our local GPs across Ashton, Denton, Glossop, Hyde and Stalybridge.<br />
<a class="cp-btn button2" href="/about-us">About us</a>&nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;
<h2 style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0pt; text-align: center;"><a href="/coronavirusaccessingprimarycare"><span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Coronavirus (COVID-19): Service changes, support and guidance</span></a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="owl-item-bg" style="background-image: url(&quot;/Sites/NHSTGCCG/theme/images/carousel/carouselbg2.jpg&quot;);">
